des:
Go beyond smart. Choose brilliant. This skill makes it easy to enjoy popular shows, movies, and streaming content on your smart TV. Using just your voice, you can play video and music, change channels, control volume, switch inputs, and more - Just ask Alexa!

Before enabling this skill, please set the "TV Control with Alexa" menu in "Settings->System->Advanced System" of your TV. Then, follow the directions.
NOTE: If you do not see "TV Control with Alexa" in your system settings, your TV does not support Alexa Voice yet.

Once you have linked your TV, you can try the following voice commands:

POWER ON/OFF
"Alexa, power off [TV name]."
"Alexa, turn on [TV name]."

CONTROL VOLUME
"Alexa, turn up the volume on [TV name]."
"Alexa, turn down the volume by 10 on [TV name]."*
"Alexa, set the volume to 20 on [TV name]."*
"Alexa, mute [TV name]."

SWITCH INPUT SOURCE
"Alexa, switch input to HDMI 1 on [TV name]."

CHANGE CHANNEL
"Alexa, channel up on [TV name]."
"Alexa, change channel to 6 on [TV name]."
"Alexa, change channel to BBC on [TV name]."

PLAYBACK CONTROL**
"Alexa, play on [TV name]."
"Alexa, pause on [TV name]."
"Alexa, stop on [TV name]."
"Alexa, play next on [TV name]."
"Alexa, fast forward on [TV name]."
"Alexa, skip 10 seconds on [TV name]."

LAUNCH APPS AND TV MENUS***
"Alexa, launch YouTube."
"Alexa, go to network settings."

SEARCH AND PLAY
"Alexa, show me the movie Star Wars."
"Alexa, play the movie Star Wars."

KEYPAD SHORTCUT
"Alexa, go right."
"Alexa, move down."

RECORD CONTROL****
"Alexa, start recording on [TV name]."
"Alexa, stop recording on [TV name]."

NOTES:
*Not all external audio systems support volume control by number.
**Playback control works on local media playback. For apps, playback control varies based on apps capabilities.
***Some apps and menus may not support this command.
****Record Control availability varies based on TV models and locations.

TV Name:
You will be prompted to name your TV during the setup. Pick a unique name for every TV you set up. Use this name to tell Alexa which TV to control. You do not need to use the name every time you speak to Alexa. After the first time you ask Alexa to control your TV, Alexa will assume any applicable commands are for the same TV for the next 15 minutes.
